name: Live Build: YNAB component library 001
description:
In this "Live Build" series I'll demo different component building techniques and best practices as I build a YNAB component library from scratch. After every stream I'll publish a copy of the updated file here in the Figma community for folks to download and explore.


‚ñ∂Ô∏è Watch past streams, and join for future ones!


I've been writing about Figma components for a little while, but recently realized video might be a more helpful medium for sharing what I've learned.


Why YNAB? First, it‚Äôs one of my all-time favorite products. Second, it‚Äôs got a relatively complicated interface! I think this will be a fun but challenging build that will allow me to cover a lot of topics.

‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨

I'm Alice, a design operations practitioner. One of my favorite parts of design ops work is pairing with product designers to build high quality, super flexible, easy to use Figma component to make designing mockups and prototypes easier, faster, and more enjoyable.


If you're interested in joining me during the next stream, sign up for my newsletter on my website, or subscribe to my youtube channel to be notified when the video of the next stream is uploaded.
